name: The Four Seals
description:
THE FOUR SEALS

You hear the earth move beneath your feat, the caves are opening again!

The four seals is a top down tower defense game with city builder aspects, in which you have to defend your home from incoming monsters, that were awoken from their slumber, in this procedurally generated world!

How do you defend your humble abode, you may ask yourself, well simply by using spike traps, poison traps, bomb towers and more! 

The goal of the game is to seal all of the 4 cave entrances situated in the 4 cardinal directions, N, E, S and W. After that, your defenses power will be tested, so prepare!

The game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2, with the theme of "Let There Be Chaos"
